title: 求问大佬1.12.2如何右键告示牌执行指令
author: CHNoob

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-20 16:39
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"111\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action ...
大佬请问value后面接的是不是就是所要执行的指令？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
CHNoob 发表于 2019-8-20 18:25
大佬请问value后面接的是不是就是所要执行的指令？
是的。

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-20 18:25
是的。
感谢大佬

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2019-8-20 16:35
/blockdata ~ ~1 ~ 
{Text1:"[{\"text\":\"提示\",\"color\":\"red\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_co ...
感谢大佬awa

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-20 16:32
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"111\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action ...
请问如何指定告示牌朝向

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-20 16:32
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"111\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action ...
请问大佬能否控制告示牌的朝向

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
CHNoob 发表于 2019-8-21 21:14
请问大佬能否控制告示牌的朝向
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"111\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/say 111\"}}"}

更改加粗的数字即可

replies.author: CHNoob
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-21 21:16
/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{\"text\":\"111\",\"clickEvent\":{\"acti ...
谢大佬awa
